column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The hype is warranted. I grew up in the Chicago area ("da Region
column2: Northwest Indiana) and have had and loved Edwardo's, Gino's East, Giordano's, and the original Uno but this was the best deep dish I've ever had- a small (feeds 2!) with sausage, just too much to dream. That damn crust, ohhhhhhhhhh.....
